Virat Kohli vs. Jeremy Gordon: Kohli’s batting prowess against Gordon’s pace will be a fascinating contest.
Jasprit Bumrah vs. Navneet Dhaliwal: Bumrah’s death bowling skills against Dhaliwal’s hitting abilities will be pivotal.
India is the clear favorite based on current form and historical performance, but T20 cricket is known for its unpredictability.
